short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get papers for any topic in any webpage. Opens a new tab with research papers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight any keyword or text in the current tab, click the extension icon, followed by the "search" button. Links to research papers on your selection will open in a new tab.
